snippet: The city wants one, in Willets Point, and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo wants another, at the Aqueduct racetrack, a proposal that has fed suspicions about officials’ intentions.
abstract: Proposal by Gov Andrew M Cuomo for a convention center at Aqueduct racetrack raises questions about the fate of long-standing city plans for a smaller convention center at Willets Point, Queens; city officials seem increasingly less wedded to a convention center as a part of a larger redevelopment plan for the area, and both the Aqueduct and Willets Point convention center plans come at a time when such projects are losing their appeal nationally.
lead_paragraph: The city wants one, in Willets Point, and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo wants another, at the Aqueduct racetrack, a proposal that has fed suspicions about officials’ intentions.

headline.seo: Queens Questions Need for 2 Convention Centers
headline.main: Queens Questions Need for 2 Convention Halls
headline.print_headline: Queens Wonders, Does One Borough Need Two Convention Halls?
